basics.name: Emily Zhang
basics.label: Technical Product Manager
basics.summary: Strategic Technical Product Manager with 7+ years of experience leading cross-functional teams in developing innovative software solutions. Strong background in agile methodologies and data-driven decision making. Track record of successful product launches generating over $50M in revenue.

work.name: CloudTech Solutions
work.summary: Leading product strategy for cloud infrastructure platform
highlights: Led development of containerization platform used by 10,000+ developers
Increased platform adoption by 200% through strategic feature releases
Reduced customer onboarding time from 2 weeks to 2 days
Managed $15M annual product budget and team of 25

work.name: SoftwareX
highlights: Launched CI/CD platform generating $10M ARR in first year
Reduced development cycle time by 40% through process improvements
Led integration with 20+ third-party tools and services

work.name: TechStart Inc
highlights: Launched mobile app with 1M+ downloads in first month
Increased user retention by 45% through feature optimization
Implemented analytics framework for data-driven decisions

projects.name: Developer Platform Redesign
projects.description: Complete overhaul of developer platform and documentation
highlights: Increased developer satisfaction score from 7.2 to 9.1
